nodes.text: TC-70 was a TC-series protocol droid who served as a translator for Jabba the Hutt during the Clone Wars and into the Imperial Era. However, between 10 BBY and 4 ABY, Jabba had a different protocol unit serving as his translator droid.
TC-70 first appeared in the Star Wars: The Clone Wars film, and was voiced by Nika Futterman. Although TC-70 was not named onscreen, she is named in the film's credits.
